title: konjam dayai
sahitya:
konjam dayai puriyalAgAdA guha SaNmukhanE


anupallavi

  nenjam tAmarai ilai nIr pOl tattaLikkudE
tanjam vErillai undan tiruvuLLam aiyAdA
			(madhyama kAlam)
tandaiyum arumait-tAyum nIyena santatam unai ninainda shEyenai
andi paghalum varunda viDuvadu azhagidO pazhani ANDava muruganE


caraNam    mAyai ulaga vAzvenrarindum idai viTTODa vazhiyum teriyavillai manadil  tuNivum illai nIyum aDimaiyai anjEl aruLAyAgil  nItii iduvO dayai nidiyE evar gatiyE
			(madhyama kAlam)
nidamum un kamalappada malariNaiyai ninaindurugi manam kanindu bhajikkum en
idayam kavalai illAda nilaiyaDaiya irangilAi tiru arangan maruga Ezhaikku
